title: Implementation Unit Specification
description: Schema for atomic implementation units within a work stream. Each unit is independently verifiable and maps to a single SE agent invocation.

id.description: Unique unit identifier within the work stream (e.g., U-001)

title.description: Short descriptive title (e.g., 'Order entity types and validation')

layer.description: Layer classification determining dependency ordering and verification level

depends_on_units.description: Unit IDs that must complete before this unit can start

requirements.description: Functional requirement IDs this unit addresses (e.g., ['FR-1'])

description.description: What to implement. Specific enough that success is demonstrable.

verification.description: Verification gate that must pass before dependent units start

codebase_anchor.description: Path to similar code in the existing codebase to use as exemplar pattern (e.g., 'internal/user/handler.go:CreateUser')

files_to_create.description: New files this unit is expected to create

files_to_modify.description: Existing files this unit is expected to modify
